title: La Voix Joins Annie Musical Tour
summary: La Voix, a famous drag queen from Buckinghamshire, is very excited to play Miss Hannigan in the Annie musical tour across the UK. The tour starts in May 2026 in Wimbledon and will visit cities like Birmingham, Manchester, and more. La Voix says Miss Hannigan is a loud and chaotic character, perfect for her. Other stars like Paul O'Grady have played this role before. La Voix had to leave Strictly Come Dancing because of an injury, but she is happy about her new role. The article shares her feelings and the tour details for fans to enjoy.

In which year does the Annie tour begin?

background_read: Annie is a popular musical about a little orphan girl. Miss Hannigan is the mean caretaker. La Voix is a drag queen who entertains people by dressing up and performing. She was on TV shows like Strictly Come Dancing and RuPaul's Drag Race UK. A tour means the show travels to many cities so more people can see it. Injuries can happen in dancing, and La Voix had to stop because of one.
Article_Structure: WHO: La Voix, a drag queen and TV star
WHAT: She will play Miss Hannigan in the Annie musical tour
WHERE: The tour visits UK cities like Wimbledon, Birmingham, and Manchester
WHY: She is excited and feels it's the perfect role for her

perspectives.description: She is very happy and confident about playing Miss Hannigan
The musical will travel to many places over two years
